descriptions.user: Manage user account information and personal preferences

general.title: General Settings
general.autoSaveDescription: Automatically save document and project changes
general.defaultProjectPathDescription: Default save location for new projects
general.maxRecentProjectsDescription: Maximum number of recent projects to display
general.autoStartDescription: Automatically start the application when the system starts
general.minimizeToTrayDescription: Minimize to system tray instead of closing when window is closed
general.closeToTrayDescription: Minimize to system tray when close button is clicked

user.title: User Settings
user.accountInfoDescription: View and manage your basic account information
user.name: Name
user.emailDescription: Your email address for receiving notifications
user.emailValidation: Please enter a valid email address

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.themeDescription: Choose the basic appearance theme for the application
appearance.fontFamilyDescription: Select the font used in the interface
appearance.basicThemeDescription: Choose the basic appearance theme for the application. Note: Custom themes will override these settings when activated.

themes.systemDescription: Automatically switch based on system settings

customTheme.title: Custom Themes
customTheme.sectionDescription: Import and manage your custom themes
customTheme.overrideNotice: Custom themes will override the basic theme settings above

errors.nameAndCssRequired: Please enter theme name and CSS content
errors.nameExists: Theme name already exists, please use a different name
errors.cssRequired: Please enter CSS content for preview
errors.completeInfo: Please fill in complete theme information

language.title: Language & Region
language.languageChangedDescription: Language settings have been updated. Some changes may require restarting the application to take effect
language.autoDetectLanguageDescription: Automatically switch app language based on system language
language.regionFormatDescription: Configure date, time and number display formats

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.advancedDescription: Configure detailed notification rules and timing

accessibility.title: Accessibility Features
accessibility.upcomingFeatures: Coming soon: screen reader support, high contrast mode, keyboard navigation, and more

privacy.title: Privacy & Visibility
privacy.dataPrivacyDescription: Manage application privacy settings and data protection
privacy.visibilityDescription: Control information visibility and sharing scope
privacy.privacyUpcomingFeatures: Coming soon: data encryption, access permissions, privacy mode, and more
privacy.visibilityUpcomingFeatures: Coming soon: project visibility, file sharing permissions, collaboration settings, and more

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.developerDescription: Configure advanced features and developer options
advanced.experimentalFeaturesDescription: Enable experimental features under development (may be unstable)
advanced.performanceDescription: Optimize application performance and resource usage
advanced.hardwareAccelerationDescription: Use GPU acceleration for rendering (requires restart)
advanced.resetDescription: Restore all settings to default values
advanced.resetConfirmDescription: This will delete all custom settings and restore defaults. This action cannot be undone.
advanced.resetSuccessMessage: All settings have been reset to default values
advanced.maxLogFilesDescription: Maximum number of log files to keep
advanced.enableTelemetryDescription: Send anonymous usage data to improve the product

commandPalette.title: Command Palette
commandPalette.description: View and manage command palette plugins

pluginManagement.title: Plugin Management
pluginManagement.description: View currently registered command palette plugins and their published commands
pluginManagement.toggleErrorDescription: Unable to update plugin status, please try again later

audioVideo.title: Audio & Video
audioVideo.audioDescription: Configure audio input/output devices and quality options
audioVideo.videoDescription: Configure video recording and playback options
audioVideo.inDevelopment: Audio & video settings are under development...
audioVideo.upcomingFeatures: Coming soon: audio device selection, quality adjustment, video recording, and more
